What is a launcher/shortcut extension?
A launcher or shortcut extension allows you to jump into your favorite games, like Papa's Bakeria, with the simple click of a button. Instead of searching for the game every time, the extension adds a little icon to your browser. Two clicks, and boom â€“ you're transported right to the heart of Papa's Bakeria on Magbei.com, ready to bake those delicious pies!
